name: Ancestral Healing
desc: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt

name: Bloodlust
desc: Give your minions +3 attack this turn.

name: Hex
desc: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

name: Immolation Aura
desc: Deal 1 damage to all minions twice.

name: Radiance
desc: Restore 5 Health to your hero

name: Slam
desc: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

name: Book of Specters
desc: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
desc: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.

name: Sprint
desc: Draw 4 cards.

name: Swarm of Locusts
desc: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.

name: Polymorph
desc: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.

name: Friendly Smith
desc: Discover a weapon from any class. Add it to your Adventure Deck with +2/+2.

name: ??Torrent
desc: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Cost 3 less if you cast a spell last turn.

name: ??Kill Command
desc: Deal 3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.

name: ??Tip the Scales
desc: Summon 7 Muriocs from your deck.

name: ??Gnomish Army Knife
desc: Give a minion Charge, Windfury, Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Poisonous, Taunt, and Stealth.

name: Fireball
desc: Deal 6 damage.

name: Drain Life
desc: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.

name: Learn Draconic
desc: Sidequest: Spend 8 mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.

name: Strength in Numbers
desc: Sidequest: Spend 10 mana on minions. Reward: Summon a minion from your deck.
